alert.note: Alert for Escambia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 08 at 11:18PM EDT until April 11 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Alabama... Florida... Escambia River Near Century affecting Escambia County. For the Escambia River...including Century...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Escambia River Near Century. * WHEN...From Sunday afternoon to early Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, considerable flooding of lowlands. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:05 PM CDT Friday the stage was 16.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.0 feet early Sunday afternoon. It will then begin to fall, falling below flood stage early Monday morning. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued when updates occur.
